text: Hershkovitz's titi (Plecturocebus dubius) is a species of titi, a type of New World monkey, from South America. It is found in Bolivia, Brazil, and Peru. The common name is in reference to American zoologist Philip Hershkovitz, who described the species as Callicebus dubius in 1988. ==References== Hershkovitz's titi Category:Mammals of Brazil Category:Mammals of Peru Category:Mammals of Bolivia Hershkovitz's titi
title: Hershkovitz's titi
